      • SslSocketFactoryProvider

        @Deprecated
public SslSocketFactoryProvider()
        已过时。 Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider instead.

      • SslSocketFactoryProvider

        @Deprecated
public SslSocketFactoryProvider(java.lang.String appHomeDir,
                                            java.lang.String truststorePassword)
        已过时。 Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider instead.
        Creates a new instance. Use this for clients (that only work with a truststore).
        参数:
        appHomeDir - The application's home directory to look for the keystore and truststore files.
        truststorePassword - The password for the truststore.

      • SslSocketFactoryProvider

        @Deprecated
public SslSocketFactoryProvider(java.lang.String appHomeDir,
                                            java.lang.String keystorePassword,
                                            java.lang.String truststorePassword)
        已过时。 Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider instead.
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        appHomeDir - The application's home directory to look for the keystore and truststore files.
        keystorePassword - The password for the keystore.
        truststorePassword - The password for the truststore.
